Description.Text: Park Inn by Radisson Lyon-Ouest is a modern 3-star hotel offering stylish accommodation in northwest Lyon. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool. restaurant, bar and free Wi-Fi. La Tour-de-Salvagny is a leafy green area which is home to a variety of business and commercial enterprises. It boasts good direct road links into central Lyon. Nearby places of interest include Parc de l'Aqueduc and Salvagny golf course. Arret de la Tour-de-Salvagny train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Lyon destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, terrace with sun loungers and a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 23sqm and decorated in a modern style with chequered wallpaper and light wood furniture. Amenities include a satellite TV, mini-bar and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. Le Green restaurant offers regional and national cuisine. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at Le Fairway bar. Free parking is possible onsite.
